fg_segments: World War I Document Archive:Privacy policy - World War I Document Archive
Contributors to the World War I Document Archive are welcome.

However, a sign-in and password are necessary in order to add and edit material; thus your contributions will be evaluated for retention and you will not be anonymous. In all other ways, your privacy is sancrosanct.

We give you the option to access your information, but not to edit or delete it. This includes any account information you have explicitly provided to us or specified in the preferences.
This concerns our users' information (like your user profile info).
We give you the option to delete your account. We might still keep part of your data. This includes any account information you have explicitly provided to us or specified in the preferences.
